changelog: Rebuilt the backend with Rust and Tauri to improve performance, reliability, and maintainability.
Implemented native support for Steam achievements to provide a more robust and consistent data flow.
Linux packaging support is now available for Debian/Ubuntu (.deb), Fedora/RHEL (.rpm), and Arch Linux (.pkg.tar.zst).
Enhanced the application theme system for a cleaner and more cohesive visual experience.
Refined game and achievement management workflows for better accuracy and operational stability.
Delivered broad usability, architecture, and quality-of-life improvements across the application.
